mapper.sql: user_id, username, sex, phone, telephone, email, id_card, birthday, province, city, county, address, current_address, politics, national, marriage, education, userface, remark
mapper.insert: insert into employee_staff_detail_t(user_id, username, password, sex, phone, telephone, email, id_card, birthday, province, city, county, address,current_address, politics, national, marriage, education, userface, remark, delete_flag, create_time, update_time) values(#{userId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{idCard}, #{birthday}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{address}, #{currentAddress}, #{politics}, #{national}, #{marriage}, #{education}, #{userface}, #{remark}, #{deleteFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select password from employee_staff_detail_t where delete_flag = 0 and username = #{username}

select
from employee_staff_detail_t where user_id = ( select user_id from employee_staff_user_t where emp_id = #{empId}) and delete_flag = 0

select result., result.dept_name, result., result.emp_id, result.emp_name, result.participate_time, result.leave_time, result.leave_reason, result_esb.emp_name super_emp_name from (select esde_ed., esde_ed.dept_name, esdu_esb., esdu_esb. from ( select esde.emp_position, esde.super_emp_id, esde.dept_id, esde.emp_id, ed.dept_name from employee_staff_dept_t esde left join employee_dept_t ed on esde.dept_id = ed.dept_id where esde.delete_flag = 0 and ed.delete_flag = 0 ) esde_ed left join ( select esdu., esb. from ( select esd.,esu.emp_id from employee_staff_detail_t esd left join employee_staff_user_t esu on esd.user_id = esu.user_id where esd.delete_flag = 0 ) esdu left join employee_staff_base_t esb on esdu.emp_id = esb.emp_id where esb.delete_flag = 0 ) esdu_esb on esde_ed.emp_id = esdu_esb.emp_id) result left join employee_staff_base_t result_esb on result.super_emp_id = result_esb.emp_id

select * from ( select result., result.dept_name, result., result.emp_id, result.emp_name, result.participate_time, result.leave_time, result.leave_reason, result_esb.emp_name as super_emp_name from (select esde_ed., esde_ed.dept_name, esdu_esb., esdu_esb. from ( select esde.emp_position, esde.super_emp_id, esde.dept_id, esde.emp_id, ed.dept_name from employee_staff_dept_t esde left join employee_dept_t ed on esde.dept_id = ed.dept_id where esde.delete_flag = 0 and ed.delete_flag = 0 ) esde_ed left join ( select esdu., esb. from ( select esd.,esu.emp_id from employee_staff_detail_t esd left join employee_staff_user_t esu on esd.user_id = esu.user_id where esd.delete_flag = 0 ) esdu left join employee_staff_base_t esb on esdu.emp_id = esb.emp_id where esb.delete_flag = 0 ) esdu_esb on esde_ed.emp_id = esdu_esb.emp_id) result left join employee_staff_base_t result_esb on result.super_emp_id = result_esb.emp_id ) res where res.dept_name = #{deptName} or res.emp_position = #{deptName}
select * from employee_staff_detail_t where delete_flag = 0 and email = #{email}

select * from ( select result., result.dept_name, result., result.emp_id, result.emp_name, result.participate_time, result.leave_time, result.leave_reason, result_esb.emp_name as super_emp_name from (select esde_ed., esde_ed.dept_name, esdu_esb., esdu_esb. from ( select esde.emp_position, esde.super_emp_id, esde.dept_id, esde.emp_id, ed.dept_name from employee_staff_dept_t esde left join employee_dept_t ed on esde.dept_id = ed.dept_id where esde.delete_flag = 0 and ed.delete_flag = 0 ) esde_ed left join ( select esdu., esb. from ( select esd.,esu.emp_id from employee_staff_detail_t esd left join employee_staff_user_t esu on esd.user_id = esu.user_id where esd.delete_flag = 0 ) esdu left join employee_staff_base_t esb on esdu.emp_id = esb.emp_id where esb.delete_flag = 0 ) esdu_esb on esde_ed.emp_id = esdu_esb.emp_id) result left join employee_staff_base_t result_esb on result.super_emp_id = result_esb.emp_id ) lyx where lyx.emp_name like "%"#{empName}"%"
select from employee_staff_detail_t where delete_flag = 0 and email = #{email}
